EngineRule.ruleSpecification:
<AttributeValues objType="wt.epm.EPMDocument">
<!-- set the lifecycle --> <AttrValue id="lifeCycle.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.foundation.lifecycle.server.impl.LifeCycleTemplateAttributeAlgorithm"> <!-- NOTE: this argument value must be the same as the name of the lifecycle template in loadFiles\pdmlink\1PhaseDevelopmentLifecycleTemplate.xml --> <Arg>LC_epmdoc_Cycle</Arg> </AttrValue>
<AttrConstraint id="number" algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GatherAttributeConstraints"> </AttrConstraint>
</AttributeValues>
